review: I have been searching for a way to display my computer screen on the TV. I thought this was it. Great idea, right? Well, it does what it says it will but trying to watch a TV show or movie is not so good. The picture is jerky. It stops and starts. I've tried everything to try to correct the problem but it is not much better. Pretty labor intensive.I will not be sending it back. I may find a use for it yet.I would recommend this to a friend with a full disclosure of it's limitations.

review: This item did not work! The item did not work with my router. Called google to get help to connect to my router and they told me I needed to call my ISP. My ISP said I needed to talk to google. Back and forth like that a couple of times. Wasted hours of time trying to change router settings and the thing never worked. author: Kmacked12

review: I have two Rokus, a Roku LT and a Roku 3. Without any hesitation, the Roku 3 destroys all competition. That being said, this Chromecast is a nice little thing for such a good price. Yes, the Roku 3 is faster, has more apps, better tech specs, a physical remote, and a lot more, but it's 3 times the price of this. If you're looking for a cheap way to get stuff from the internet (and your phone) onto your TV, this is a good little unit. If you really want the good stuff though, don't hesitate another minute and buy a Roku 3.
